name: Heroku AriaNG 21vianet. Heroku AriaNG 世纪互联版

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: This should be the same as "App name" above.

RCLONE_CONFIG.description: Rclone config to mount in one line, replace line breaks with "\n"

SA_ZIP_URL.description: Service Accounts ZIP URL.It Should be Zipped Such that it should have a folder named accounts with SA in it

SA_INIT_FILE.description: Give a service account File Name. ex 1.json

RCLONE_DESTINATION.description: Rclone destination path, format "[drivename A]:[remove path A]"

RCLONE_DESTINATION_2.description: If you mount a second cloud drive, then fill in "[drivename B]:[remove path B]"

SHELL_ON_COMPLETE.description: Script to be executed after the task is completed. ex "rclone copy Google:{TD1} Google:{TD2}"

UNPACK_PASSWORDS.description: unpack passwords in one line, replace line breaks with "\n"
